# preferredFocusedView

**Instance Property**

The view that the focus will be redirected to if this guide is focused.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor weak var preferredFocusedView: UIView? { get set }
```

## Discussion

If the guide is focused, it indirects the focus to this view. This view, or at least one view along its [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIFocusGuide/preferredFocusedView] chain, must be focusable in order for the guide to be focusable. Otherwise, it’s effectively disabled.

## Enabling focus

- **isEnabled**: A Boolean value that indicates whether the guide is focusable.
- **preferredFocusEnvironments**: An array of focus environments to which the guide directs focus, ordered by priority.
